cons: Avoid taking cranberry extract products or drinking a lot of cranberry juice if you have a history of kidney stones.
description: The high level of antioxidant proanthocyanidins (PACs) in cranberries helps to stop certain bacteria from adhering to the urinary tract walls. In this way, the PACs in cranberries help prevent infection.
It helps to improving the platelets and to reducing blood pressure, through anti-inflammatory mechanisms.
It reduces the Risk of Heart Disease.
It gives Benefits to the Digestive Tract.
name: Craberries
pros: The high level of antioxidant proanthocyanidins (PACs) in cranberries helps to stop certain bacteria from adhering to the urinary tract walls. In this way, the PACs in cranberries help prevent infection.
It helps to improving the platelets and to reducing blood pressure, through anti-inflammatory mechanisms.
It reduces the Risk of Heart Disease.
It gives Benefits to the Digestive Tract.
Not enough reliable information about the safety of taking cranberry for therapeutic reasons if you are pregnant or breast feeding. Stay on the safe side and avoid use.
Some people use cranberry to increase urine flow, kill germs, and reduce fever.
